quest.name: You and the Ailouros
journal:
 Quest Sync
At Hippothoe's side is a familiar creature.
objectives: Speak with the ailouros and follow her lead.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: My, what a familiar essence you have! Like that of a familiar...if you're familiar with the concept?

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Oh, just my little joke. Forename, was it? I am Hippothoe.

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: (-Ailouros-)Meeew. Mew!

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, we're getting to that. Forename, say “hello” to our familiar friend here. She's an ailouros.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: The ailouroi are one of our newest creations, highly attuned to abnormalities in their environment. At the first sign of danger, they'll sound the alarum─by which I mean “mewl loudly.”

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Though we do our best to observe all of our creations, Elpis is simply too large to maintain a constant vigil over each and every temperamental species. A more efficient means of detecting conflict between creatures was in order.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Thus have I taken this ailouros under my wing, to further develop her capabilities in this area. And she does enjoy our little walks.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: This eveningThis morningToday, we are testing her ability to pinpoint sites of conflict. Would you like to observe?

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Simply tell her that her task is begun, and she'll do her utmost to locate disruptive creatures.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Please do subdue any unruly subjects once you've found them. We can't have beasts running amok!

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Never fear─she is quite proficient in our language. You need only let her know to begin.

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: Mew?

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: Mew, mew!

dialogue.name: SYTEM
dialogue.text: Follow the ailouros and try not to fall behind.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: My ailouroi would never lead you astray─in theory, at least.

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: Mrrr... Mew!!!

dialogue.name: SYTEM
dialogue.text: The ailouros alerts you to two nearby creatures that are facing one another down, and looks at you expectantly.

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: Mrrrp!

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: She seems quite content, but in the name of science─what were the results?

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: As I expected. Well done, little one!

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: Magnificent creatures, the both of you. It's a shame we cannot give you a pair of tiny wings and a bell too, but it's against protocol, I'm afraid.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: The ailouroi are enchanted with theirs at birth, so they are able to acclimate properly.

dialogue.name: HIPPOTHOE
dialogue.text: I'm certain you have your own unique potential to rise to, however. In fact─why not join us for another phase of testing?

dialogue.name: GEALCAT04288
dialogue.text: Mrrrp!
